column1: ConditionsEvent/Operation:Aerial Make-Ready and Strand PlacementPermit Linear Footage12705Elements of OccupancyWill move down streets with direction of traffic and stopat each pole for approximately 30-60min.From:1/5/2015 7:00AMStart Time7:00AMTo:1/16/2015 5:00PMEnd Time5:00PMNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, call(415) 554-5824 a minimum of 72 hours prior tooccupancy.  To tow a vehicle call the Tow Desk at(415) 553-1200.Special Traffic permit requiredCALL FOR Special traffic permit MAY BE required(Please check DPT Blue Book for any trafficrestrictions; to obtain a "Blue Book", please contactMTA at (415) 701-4673).Food:NMeter Segment(s)RIVERA ST: 21ST AVE intersection 01/05/2015 thru01/16/2015 (12 days) SANTIAGO ST: 21ST AVEintersection 01/05/2015 thru 01/16/2015 (12 days)Street Space Hours7:00AM Thru 5:00PMPerforming Arts:NNight Noise
